title: GEMgl
description: The `GEMgl` objects in Pure Data provide direct wrappers for OpenGL functions, enabling users to access low-level graphics rendering commands within their patches. Each OpenGL command, like `glBegin`, can be used as a Pure Data object by prepending "GEM" (e.g., `GEMglBegin`). These objects are essential for advanced visual programming and require familiarity with OpenGL.
